name: Klawz the Kat
overview: Oh no, Klawz's babe has been cat-napped by the evil Billy Bender. He has to warp through 5 worlds to rescue her...but the evil Billy Bender has set his Robo-Dogs on you, who will try to foil you in your attempt. However, you are not totally helpless, you have your wooden club to bash them on the head with...wow! Pick ups include B for bonus points, T for time, S for shield. L for speed (Leg it!) and 1 for 1-up extra life.
